LanguageData.Ammo_FatManShell_NHE.label: Nuclear shot
LanguageData.Ammo_FatManShell_NHE.description: This type is characterized by greater destructive power and radiation pollution. Increased damage is achieved at the cost of reduced range, which can turn out badly for a poorly protected shooter.
LanguageData.Ammo_FatManShell_FGM.label: Piggy Boomba
LanguageData.Ammo_FatManShell_FGM.description: Saving up can be explosive!Remember: In a world where caps are currency, the safest bank is a pig flying straight into your rivals’ faces!" —Anonymous slaver promoting "financial literacy.
LanguageData.Bullet_FatManShell_NHE.label: Nuclear shot (NHE)
LanguageData.Bullet_FatManShell_FGM.label: Piggy Boomba (FGM)
